query: What dataset was used in the paper?
shortlist: Data used in the preparation of this article were obtained from two public datasets: the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) database (adni.loni.usc.edu) and the Australian Imaging, Biomarkers and Lifestyle (AIBL) study.

The goals of this work are to assess whether the visualization method initially developed for natural images is suitable for 3D medical images and to exploit it to better understand the decisions taken by classification networks.
